text: hasta#yOstapaqsvita#rOq yOni#Scaturviq(gm)qSa iti# puqrastAqdupa# dadhAtiq catu#rvi(gm)SatyakSharA gAyaqtrI gA#yaqtrI ya#j~jamuqKaM ~Mya#j~jamuqKamEqva puqrastAqd-viyA#tayatiq garBA$H pa~jcaviq(gm)qSa iti# dakShiNaqtO&nnaqM ~Mvai garBAq anna#M pa~jcaviq(gm)qSOnna#mEqva da#kShiNaqtO dha#ttEq tasmAqd dakShi#NEqnAnna#madyataq Oja#striNaqva iti# paqScAdiqmE vai lOqkAstri#Naqva EqShvE#va lOqkEShuq prati#tiShThati saqBaMra#NastrayOviq(gm)qSa ityu# - [  ] 14
